user.title: Tasmanian Fuel Prices: Authentication
user.description: Please enter your API Key and Secret from the NSW FuelCheck API portal.

init_options.title: Tasmanian Fuel Prices: General Options
init_options.description: Configure your preferred fuel types, favourite stations, and select which discount programs you want to enable.

coles_discount.title: Configure Coles Discount
coles_discount.description:
Enter your Coles discount amount and any additional station codes not in the default list. To contribute to the main list, please visit:
https://github.com/ziogref/TAS-Fuel-HA-Additional-Data
